metadesc: The best portfolio on the planet

HomePage.title: Hi, I'm Faustin, full-stack freelance developer!
HomePage.about: I'm a developer with a passion for code, equally at home on the  <line>frontend</line> and the <line>backend</line>. My expertise allows me to add new features to existing projects or create a complete application from scratch. I mainly use <line>React</line> and <line>Next.Js</line> with <line>Typescript</line> and <line>Tailwind CSS</line>. I'm also comfortable with integrating payment methods like <line>Stripe</line>.

list.title: Méthodo
list.description: Méthodo is an application that puts teachers and students in touch with each other. Students can book private lessons with a teacher of their choice.

list.title: KOACHER
list.description: KOACHER is an application that puts sports coaches and students in touch with each other. Students can book and purchase private lessons with a coach of their choice.

list.title: Remember
list.description: Remember is an application inspired by Anki that helps you to memorize information efficiently, thanks to a card system.
missions: Personal project that allowed me to learn Nest.Js

list.title: Libden
list.description: Libden is a libértinage application.  Users can meet and chat with each other. Users can also create events and invite other users.
